com.bixlabs.bkotlin

Class ColorKt

  • com.bixlabs.bkotlin.ColorKt

  • public class ColorKt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getColorCompat(android.content.Context $receiver, int color, android.content.res.Resources.Theme theme)
      Returns a themed color integer associated with a particular resource ID. If the resource holds a complex ColorStateList, then the default color from the set is returned.
      static int getOpaque(int $receiver)
      Return the color with 0xFF opacity. E.g., 0xabcdef will be translated to 0xFFabcdef.
      static int withAlpha(int $receiver, int alpha)
      Return the color with the given alpha value. Examples:

    • Method Detail

      • getOpaque

        public static int getOpaque(int $receiver)

        Return the color with 0xFF opacity. E.g., 0xabcdef will be translated to 0xFFabcdef.

      • withAlpha

        public static int withAlpha(int $receiver,
                            int alpha)

        Return the color with the given alpha value. Examples:

        0xabcdef.withAlpha(0xCF) == 0xCFabcdef
0xFFabcdef.withAlpha(0xCF) == 0xCFabcdef

        Parameters:
        alpha - the alpha channel value: 0x0..0xFF.
        Returns:
        the color with the given alpha value applied.

      • getColorCompat

        public static int getColorCompat(android.content.Context $receiver,
                                 int color,
                                 android.content.res.Resources.Theme theme)

        Returns a themed color integer associated with a particular resource ID. If the resource holds a complex ColorStateList, then the default color from the set is returned.

        Parameters:
        color - The color resource
        theme - Resources.Theme: The theme used to style the color attributes, may be null. The same will not be used on Android versions lower than Marshmallow.
        Returns:
        A single color value in the form 0xAARRGGBB
